## ShaderFramework.discardIfClipped() method

Discard the fragment if it was clipped by the clip plane

**Signature:**

```typescript
static discardIfClipped(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

void
